ch.randelshofer.quaqua.colorchooser

Class ColorWheelImageProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.image.MemoryImageSource
      • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.colorchooser.ColorWheelImageProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageProducer

    public class ColorWheelImageProducer
extends java.awt.image.MemoryImageSource
    Produces the image of a ColorWheel.
    Version:
    $Id: ColorWheelImageProducer.java 462 2014-03-22 09:23:12Z wrandelshofer $
    Author:
    Werner Randelshofer
